result.eng: The king's only son was killed.
result.html: Maraíodh aonmhac an ríThe king's only son was killed.
result.ponchtml: Maraíoḋ aonṁac an ríThe king's only son was killed.

result.eng: Glory be to God and his only son, Jesus Christ.
result.ga: Glóir do Dhia is dá aonmhac Íosa Críost
result.orig: Glóir do Dhia is dá aonmhac Íosa Críost
result.html: Glóir do Dhia is dá aonmhac Íosa CríostGlory be to God and his only son, Jesus Christ.
result.ponchtml: Glóir do Ḋia is dá aonṁac Íosa CríostGlory be to God and his only son, Jesus Christ.

result.eng: His son has left him and he has no news of him.
result.ga: Tá a mhac imithe uaidh agus gan tásc ná tuairisc aige air
result.orig: Tá a mhac imithe uaidh agus gan tásc ná tuairisc aige air
result.html: Tá a mhac imithe uaidh agus gan tásc ná tuairisc aige airHis son has left him and he has no news of him.
result.ponchtml: Tá a ṁac imiṫe uaiḋ agus gan tásc ná tuairisc aige airHis son has left him and he has no news of him.

result.html: Seo é mo mhac SeánThis is my son Seán.
result.ponchtml: Seo é mo ṁac SeánThis is my son Seán.

result.html: An é sin do mhacIs that your son?
result.ponchtml: An é sin do ṁacIs that your son?

result.ga: Is é seo mo mhac Dara
result.orig: Is é seo mo mhac Dara
result.html: Is é seo mo mhac DaraThis is my son Dara.
result.ponchtml: Is é seo mo ṁac DaraThis is my son Dara.

result.eng: I saw her here a couple of times with your son Dara.
result.ga: Chonaic mé í anseo cúpla uair le do mhac Dara
result.orig: Chonaic mé í anseo cúpla uair le do mhac Dara
result.html: Chonaic mé í anseo cúpla uair le do mhac DaraI saw her here a couple of times with your son Dara.
result.ponchtml: Ċonaic mé í anseo cúpla uair le do ṁac DaraI saw her here a couple of times with your son Dara.

result.eng: Oh, I see that my son is crying.
result.ga: Ó feicim go bhfuil mo mhac ag caoineadh
result.orig: Ó feicim go bhfuil mo mhac ag caoineadh
result.html: Ó feicim go bhfuil mo mhac ag caoineadhOh, I see that my son is crying.
result.ponchtml: Ó feicim go ḃfuil mo ṁac ag caoineaḋOh, I see that my son is crying.

result.html: Seo é mo mhac MícheálThis is my son Michael.
result.ponchtml: Seo é mo ṁac MíċeálThis is my son Michael.

result.eng: We have a son and three daughters.
result.ga: Tá mac agus triúr iníonacha againn
result.orig: Tá mac agus triúr iníonacha againn
result.html: Tá mac agus triúr iníonacha againnWe have a son and three daughters.
result.ponchtml: Tá mac agus triúr iníonaċa againnWe have a son and three daughters.

result.eng: My brother's son has a sailing boat.
result.ga: Tá bád seoil ag mac dearthár liom
result.orig: Tá bád seoil ag mac dearthár liom
result.html: Tá bád seoil ag mac dearthár liomMy brother's son has a sailing boat.
result.ponchtml: Tá bád seoil ag mac dearṫár liomMy brother's son has a sailing boat.

result.eng: Do you have children? Yes, I have two, a son and a daughter.
result.ga: An bhfuil páistí agat - Tá tá beirt agam mac agus iníon
result.orig: An bhfuil páistí agat - Tá tá beirt agam mac agus iníon
result.html: An bhfuil páistí agat - Tá tá beirt agam mac agus iníonDo you have children? Yes, I have two, a son and a daughter.
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil páistí agat - Tá tá beirt agam mac agus iníonDo you have children? Yes, I have two, a son and a daughter.

result.eng: I have one son, Stiofán, he's five years old.
result.ga: Tá mac amháin agam Stiofán tá sé cúig bliana d'aois
result.orig: Tá mac amháin agam Stiofán tá sé cúig bliana d'aois
result.html: Tá mac amháin agam Stiofán tá sé cúig bliana d'aoisI have one son, Stiofán, he's five years old.
result.ponchtml: Tá mac aṁáin agam Stiofán tá sé cúig bliana d'aoisI have one son, Stiofán, he's five years old.
